description: "Written in the book that I prophesied publicly": The Discernment of Apocalyptic Wisdom According to the "Ascension of Isaiah" Annette Yoshiko Reed, McMaster University Beyond Revealed Wisdom and Apocalyptic Epistemology: The Redeployment of Enochic Traditions about Knowledge in Early Christianity Leslie Baynes, Missouri State University
title: Written in the book that I prophesied publicly": The Discernment of Apocalyptic Wisdom According to the "Ascension of Isaiah
